basics.name: Julian Smith
basics.label: Full-Stack Developer
basics.summary: Multifaceted Full-Stack Developer & Technical Lead with 11+ years of experience across software engineering, network infrastructure, and mission-critical satellite communications. Expert in .NET, SQL Server, and modern JavaScript frameworks (React, Next.js). A Marine Corps veteran with a proven track record of managing $2B in assets and leading complex technical operations.

work.name: Steel Dynamics
work.summary: Spearheaded the modernization of legacy internal tools into robust, scalable enterprise web applications using the .NET ecosystem.
highlights: Architected and optimized high-performance SQL Server (T-SQL) reporting systems, reducing data retrieval time by 40% for the sales department.
Designed and implemented responsive, user-centric front-end interfaces using modern JavaScript and CSS, improving user adoption.
Played a key role in Agile sprint planning and execution, translating complex stakeholder requirements into deployable software solutions.

work.name: Expedition Communications
work.summary: Orchestrated critical network infrastructure deployments and logistics for high-availability commercial clients.
highlights: Achieved 100% on-time project completion rate through rigorous inventory management and logistical planning.
Performed expert-level troubleshooting and resolution of complex connectivity issues in remote and challenging environments.
Configured and validated enterprise-grade routers, switches, and satellite modems.

work.name: DIRECTV
work.summary: Delivered premium technical service and installation for residential and commercial satellite systems.
highlights: Consistently maintained top-tier customer satisfaction ratings (CSAT) by providing clear, non-technical system education to users.
Diagnosed and repaired signal degradation issues, optimizing system performance across diverse physical installations.

work.name: United States Marine Corps
work.summary: Commanded the operation and maintenance of tactical communication assets valued at over $2 billion in high-stakes environments.
highlights: Led rapid-response deployment teams to establish secure voice and data networks in austere locations.
Mentored and trained junior Marines in technical proficiency, operational safety, and leadership protocols.
Engineered ad-hoc field solutions to restore mission-critical connectivity under combat conditions.
